mean_en: the fraudulent appropriation of funds or property entrusted to your care but actually owned by someone else
word_etyma: embezzle贪污 + ment名词后缀 → embezzlement 贪污
sentence: His embezzlement of government money has made him rich at the expense of the taxpayers.
sentence_trans: 他通过挪用政府钱财（纳税人的钱）发了财。
